description.ko: 빛과 물이 디지털 꿈의 풍경으로 어우러지는 미래 대도시의 낭만적인 모습입니다.
description.en: A romanticized view of a futuristic metropolis, where light and water blend into a digital dreamscape.

prompt: A vertical cinematic low-angle shot of a rainy cyberpunk alleyway in NEON-V. Towering skyscrapers are adorned with massive 3D holograms of koi fish in #FF00FF magenta and #00FFFF cyan. Heavy monsoon rain creates vibrant reflections on wet asphalt and rusty metal textures. Flying vehicles leave #FF6B35 orange light trails across the #1A0033 indigo sky. Volumetric fog, hyper-detailed textures, 8k resolution, ray-traced reflections, and a moody, romantic tech-noir atmosphere.
